trends: There have been no other sightings in Olustee
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was outside watching the cargo planes from the nearby air force base flying around. out to the north i noticed and extremely bright blue light just sitting there. i watched it for about five seconds or so. i though it was just a star. all of a sudden it shot east\northeast across the sky faster than anything i have ever seen and was gone instantly. the air force planes were in the are all night and the light only appeared once. i felt anxious when i saw the light move so quickly and was excited to see something of that nature.
Summary: Short light moved extremely quickly through the sky
